Kungfu.text:
You are standing at the Kungfu theme park.
You see many people who are excited.

King Kong.text:
You are sitting at the chair to watch the 3D movie in King Kong theme park.
YAY! The play is starting in a minute.

Studio Tour.text:
Now, you are ready to take a tour of the universal studios using tram in Studio Tour.
Let's go!

The Simpson's Ride.text:
You are standing in the line for the ride in The Simpson's Ride. 
There are so many people. It must be fun.

Special Effects Show.text:
You are sitting in the chair to watch the show at the Special Effects Show.
The show is going to be fantastic.

moves.west: Revenge of the Mummy The Ride

Revenge of the Mummy The Ride.text:
You are standing beside the mummy, waiting in the line, in Revenge of the Mummy The Ride. 
Spooky! I already have a goosebump.

Jurassic World.text:
You arrived at the Jurassic World.
Don't you feel like you are inside the movie?

DespicableMe Minion Mayhem.text:
You are sitting on the ride after waiting in the line for an hour in DespicableMe Minion Mayhem. 
 Can't wait to see Minions!

Water World.text:
You are standing in the exit of the Water World.
You are all wet!

The Wizarding World Harry Potter.text:
You are standing in the line to buy the butter beer in The Wizarding World Harry Potter.
Yummy!

City Walk.text:
You standing in the City Walk.
You are all wet!
